Package com.larashores.laraspipes.datagen

Class DataProvider

java.lang.Object
com.larashores.laraspipes.datagen.DataProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
ItemPipeComponentData
public abstract class DataProvider extends Object
DataProvider class that allows defining all datagen related methods for a block in a single class.
